Thaumaturgy 6

Leprosy
Ritual
D5
spell id [id]: 1028
effect number [effect_number]: 64
damage [damage]: 1
spec [spec]: 545787904
range [provrange]: 4 provinces
number of effects [nreff]: 1
precision [precision]: -1
gems required [gemcost]: 10D
Leprosy:1 ?
 
(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
The mage conjures forth a wasting disease upon an enemy army in a distant province. Diseased targets will never regain any lost hit points and will take damage every season they are alive. Undead, demons and inanimate beings are not affected by this spell.
50% of the units in the targeted province must make a MR check or get diseased.
